content: I still love watching them, though I haven't really thought about why.

I've been wandering between world bubbles lately,
My clients can't find me,
And they seem... quite anxious about it.

But they're quite shy and hide deep inside.
No worries! I love shy...
gems!

A camera's magic lies in freezing memories and time into eternity,
Memories fade, and photos, {短暂停}photos do too,
Some photos fade into lovely new colors, how cute~.

The DIY Cards must have given you lots of creative inspiration, right?
I've designed cards with kings, knights, and jesters too,
but I never wanted to actually make them.

It's good that you haven't seen it before.
Oh, it's not dangerous - it's where I used to live,
A curiosity shop inherited from my parents.

Capturing every detail of what the eye beholds onto paper,
That's the painter's own brand of romance.
As for us stylists, we're more childlike - we just play with color blocks~.

But I won't give up like this, Manna!
I'll definitely find a way to fix my neckerchief!

Places I've never been, things I've never seen,
And dangers I've never encountered!
Getting lost is entertainment, bhan!

About a chat topic... (thinking)
Yesterday morning, when I was feeling drowsy,
I saw two neighbors whose houses were right next to each other open their windows at the same time and spot each other.

Do you believe there are treasures hidden in each world bubble?
While wandering around,
I keep an eye out for special markings.

About chatting... (thinking)
I don't understand the rules of conversation.
To me, interacting with others is just a way to gather information.

Oh, I was just thinking...
Haven't had much time lately to create new things.
The tools I make myself always work better for me.

Hmm... in the mineral veins around here,
there seem to be some big colorful treasures,
and some little blue ones...

298, 299, 300...
I've listened to 300 episodes of Parade Station's late-night horror stories,
which means I've been sleepless for a whopping 300 days!
In martial arts novels, the hero always seems to fall off a cliff and meet some legendary master, then learns incredible kung fu techniques.

Understanding how things work,
Following rules brings knowledge to light,
When life's rules are clear, we understand each other without words.

What?! I missed both breakfast AND lunch?!
Then that means—
I missed out on SIX delicious portions of meat!

This makes me think...
We should design different card rules
for different countries.

Letting them perform in my mind,
Collecting different card "outfits,"
It's fascinating in itself.

Every time I go out, I size up the people I meet,
thinking of what to say.
So when I figure it out, if we ever meet again.

I've been cooped up in the dojo training for so long that I've hit a wall.
Time to find somewhere with a different view to clear my head,
and push past my limits!

My neckerchief was a gift from Mummy before I left home,
but while I was practicing my punches,
it got caught on a wooden post and tore.

People have asked if I ever get scared traveling alone.
I do, when the night is deep and quiet.
That's when I take out my phone and light up the screen.

Find the festive music in the playlist,
Press play,
And watch all those scary feelings melt away~.

About chat topics... (思考)
Oh, haunted objects,
They're basically "inanimate things" that start acting strangely.

Quite the contrary,
I want to "express" myself.
Or rather, express a moment of who I am.

When you take a stroll, it's easier to calm your mind
and notice the beauty around you.
If you walk too fast, you'll only focus on catching your breath.

I often get lost in places full of flowers and plants,
but when it comes to rocky areas,
I can actually find my way around quite well.

When you wake up in different worlds,
sometimes you discover creatures you've never seen before.
Looks like we're not the only actors on this world's stage.

In my dictionary,
the words "forbidden" and "rules" don't exist—
I ate those pages!

As you can see, I've forgotten where I took off from again.
And I didn't note down which way the wind was blowing on my balloon either.
Where do you think I came from?

Fashion stylists always tell their clients to dress for themselves,
not to be bound by others' opinions,
then proceed to revise their styling plans over and over based on client feedback.

About chat topics... (thinking)
I've been hopping between various chaos worlds lately, hunting for supernatural phenomena and oddities.
Been going through coffee beans so fast, haven't had time to restock.

Some beautiful sights are best enjoyed at night,
Like that little hill with evening primrose where fireflies dance...
If you've been there before, would you mind showing me the way?

When I'm wandering outside,
what I miss most is a bowl of hot soup.
Come to think of it, Metropolis's spicy hot pot broth is perfect for cold weather.

Who would be so inconsiderate,
leaving useless stuff lying around!
It's blocking the radiance of real treasures!

But there's still a tiny chance it could be related to
those legendary martial arts manuals...
Should I go take a look?
Among Tala's records, there's a collection of commercial jingles\nprinted on the back of the album since they weren't included\nin the official release.

According to my school's martial arts manual,
the best way to master the "Immovable as Mountain" technique is to go fishing.
It sounds logical at first, but something feels a bit off when you think about it.

The "Eighteen Fists of the Lobster-Subduing Style" is my worst technique.
Maybe I should find an opponent who's on my level
to help me break through this martial arts bottleneck?

Oh, I didn't lose it.
The shop was full of strange artifacts and supernatural tales,
Then one day I woke up, and the shop had vanished along with everyone else.

I choose a new mask every day,
Sometimes I even make them myself,
It's not that I want to isolate myself,

Sometimes, I catch random rideshares,
Hopping into cars with unknown destinations, not knowing where I'll end up.
It's my way of relieving stress. Just like now.

Having to rush around before dawn,
Washing up, putting on makeup, practicing the tightrope dance I just learned last night!
And usually only having two eggs to eat!

So floofy...
<color=#695c3a>I wanna pet it...</color>
{短暂停}Oh, it's nothing.

I don't like sweet drinks,
and I don't like salty ones either.
That's right, the spicier the better, I'll show you...

Though I'm not great at catching them,
in places with good ecosystems,
we're bound to find more new creatures, right?

An object that should not be alive,
Abnormally gained vitality,
Affecting living things... oh, living people.
Is there any other way I could earn some extra money?

So meeting at this very moment,
In every sense of the word,
Is quite a coincidence.

I wanted to fix it myself, but after checking a tailoring book,
I realized I don't even have the materials... *sigh*...

Oh, I was just thinking...
Now that my old "Still Here" Curiosity Shop is gone,
I wonder how clients with supernatural items will find me.

Oh, it's not that we must control everything,
But any supernatural oddity
Simply can't be left unchecked.

Many poems were inspired by witnessing various wonders.
Maybe I should try going down that path too,
and awaken my inner poet?

Do you like bugs or butterflies?
I can't really tell those little things apart.
Except for fireflies!

About our discussion topic... (thinking)
Most supernatural oddities prefer to be active at night,
vanishing without a trace during the day. I work the same way - it makes hunting them down more effective.

When I'm wandering outside,
I love listening to that album,
The music on side B feels just like my life.

You can find DIY Benches
in many chaotic bubble worlds,
but the ways and timing to get materials are unpredictable.

You know what they say, "the taller you are, the stronger you get."
Being taller would definitely help improve my martial arts skills.
But... how do I actually get taller?

"Beauty feeds the soul" is nature's biggest lie,
Today I got so lost in the scenery that I got hungry again,
Hmm, looks like... I forgot to eat. Again.

I've been hunting for supernatural curiosities lately,
and searching for the "There's More" Curiosity Shop.
Looking at you, you seem full of vitality - you probably haven't seen it.

I've noticed that numbers have different meanings in different places.
In some places, 2 is considered the greatest.
But in other places, they use 6 or 8 to represent something impressive.

Such supernatural oddities
have no place in normal life.
I will dispose of them. (draws short blade "Kaigatana")

Don't you think cracking open rocks,
and revealing what's hidden inside,
is as wild as scratching a lottery ticket?

That's right, all these rocks were split by yours truly, bhan!
Not a single ore
Can escape my watchful eye!

My part-time work schedule is already packed for this month,
but no matter how I crunch the numbers, I still don't have
enough savings to buy new plum blossom piles.

Running through the wilderness,
listening to the wind whisper past my ears,
watching leaves dance up with each step—
I call this my "digestive exercise."

Oh, when I wake from my daily slumber,
It's already dusk,
I need a cup of coffee.

I don't like doing repetitive things,
They wear down my enthusiasm for life.
Repetitive scenery? Hmm, that's an interesting question.

I hope to get lost and find myself in a vast wilderness,
with enough space to build a huge house,
where I can stuff all my precious gems and treasures inside!

But in reality, martial arts training isn't full of these
"perfect timing" moments!
<size=30>Though I am curious if cliffs like that really exist.</size>

I love the vibrant, lively colors of nature under clear skies,
and I also love how rain gives nature's colors a dreamy, misty quality,
but on windy days, {短暂停}I'd rather stay inside where it's safe~.

Traveling without a set route always brings me joy,
Every corner reveals a delightful surprise,
Since I'll get lost anyway, using a map makes no difference.

When I was younger,
I joined some trainee actor activities,
and that's how I developed trauma about waking up early!

I can't listen anymore,
I must go to bed early tonight!
.........................For sure!

One time while I was wandering around,
I fished up a bunch of books following some markers,
It seemed to be something called "The Archiboo Language Encyclopedia."

I heard there's a place hiding treasure,
Though when you hear the word "treasure"
You'd probably think of gold, silver, and jewels.

Most people have no rules for living,
So they must chat.
Oh, but what rules does chatting follow?

Whenever a firefly floats by,
my paws develop a mind of their own,
so it's not my fault, Bhan!

I wish...
There was a place where you never had to wake up early!
Unless I wanted to wake up early myself...

...Oh!
I just saw
a squirrel!
